name: Combots (itch) (HardEdge Games)
description:
Combots is a multiplayer robot war shooter set in fully procedurally generated maps with the physical environment.

  • 5 unique robots allow you to experience the game in a new way when playing for each of them.
  • 22 items for loadout, allow you to create many variations of robots.
  • 4 procedurally generated maps. Each game you will be greeted by a new map for battle.
  • 6 game modes that will dilute the fun.
  • 43 cosmetic items where everyone can decorate their robot in their own way.
